New Records: Charlie Blackmon tied Carlos Gonzalez for the fifth in franchise history with 227 career home runs
Key Match Events: Charlie Blackmon had 3 RBIs and 3 runs in the Colorado Rockies' 10-8 victory over the St. Louis Cardinals
Post-Match Reflections: Charlie Blackmon expressed his desire to enjoy his last three games
Others: The article focuses on Charlie Blackmon's father throwing out the ceremonial first pitch in one of his son's final games
